creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: sculpture made of thin wire-like strands of reddish-brown bamboo; openwork asymmetrical form; looping, open, rather flattened openwork basketweave element with varying stripes of closer-woven bamboo strips; open ends, one on top of the other; loop forms an irregular vertical ovoid shape with openings at bottom; greenish button-like element woven at bottom edge
signed: on flat lozenge-shaped element at bottom, incised: untranslated
title: Prominence
